name: Nekiri's Tail
description:
On the night of the Blood Moon, the undead Damned have risen to claim the people of Nekiri! Take their safety into your own paws as the city's feline protector and help save the city and its citizens.

Nekiri's Tail is a puzzle-stealth game where you play as both the cat guardian and the citizens of Nekiri to evade shadowy souls known as the Damned. To progress, you will have to switch between characters to advance throughout the level undetected.

Will you be able to expel the Damned and save the people of Nekiri?
